HDG.BC.content: we have our residence in the distinction (Unterscheidung) btwn Being/beings [ontological difference] > ontological difference looks negative [isn’t], OD holds differentia apart (hält Unterscheidenes auseinander) [spacing], an extension & expanse, space of all spaces > at first, know nothing of this distinction, of what it consists remains hidden: in fact > whether code word (Kennwortes) “distinction” characterizes its essence remains undecided/unasked > “the distinction” more essential than all differences/oppositions btwn beings
HDG.BC.linkedContent: we have our residence in the distinction (Unterscheidung) btwn Being/beings [ontological difference] > ontological difference looks negative [isn’t], OD holds differentia apart (hält Unterscheidenes auseinander) [spacing], an extension & expanse, space of all spaces > at first, know nothing of this distinction, of what it consists remains hidden: in fact > whether code word (Kennwortes) “distinction” characterizes its essence remains undecided/unasked > “the distinction” more essential than all differences/oppositions btwn beings

HDG.MA.content: meaning pervading technology hides itself > heed that this hidden meaning touches us everywhere (in world of technology), then we stand at once in realm that hides from us, hides in approaching us > essential trait of mystery (Geheimnis): shows itself & at same time withdraws
HDG.MA.linkedContent: meaning pervading technology hides itself > heed that this hidden meaning touches us everywhere (in world of technology), then we stand at once in realm that hides from us, hides in approaching us > essential trait of mystery (Geheimnis): shows itself & at same time withdraws

HDG.CCP.content: steadfastness (Ausdauer) hidden in Gelassenheit: Gelassenheit becomes increasingly clearer about its inner nature, being steadfast, stands w/in this > the composure (Verhaltenheit) of Gelassenheit > could correspond to highest willing, but could not > “in-dwelling (Inständigkeit)”
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: steadfastness (Ausdauer) hidden in Gelassenheit: Gelassenheit becomes increasingly clearer about its inner nature, being steadfast, stands w/in this > the composure (Verhaltenheit) of Gelassenheit > could correspond to highest willing, but could not > “in-dwelling (Inständigkeit)”

HDG.DL.content: each man, each instant, in dialogue w/ forbears, perhaps even more, and more hidden, w/ those who will come after (Nachkommen) [inheritance, promise, future full of ghosts]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: each man, each instant, in dialogue w/ forbears, perhaps even more, and more hidden, w/ those who will come after (Nachkommen) [inheritance, promise, future full of ghosts]

HDG.DL.content: So wäre denn der Mensch als der Botengänger der Botschaft der Entbergung der Zwiefalt zugleich der Grenzgänger des Grenzenlosen [man as the boarder-goer of the borderless, since he bears the message of the two-fold’s unconcealment] > man seeks the boundary’s mystery (Geheimnis der Grenze), can’t be hidden (bergen) anywhere but in the voice (Stimme), die sein Wesen be-stimmt (tunes/determines) [phonocentrism]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: So wäre denn der Mensch als der Botengänger der Botschaft der Entbergung der Zwiefalt zugleich der Grenzgänger des Grenzenlosen [man as the boarder-goer of the borderless, since he bears the message of the two-fold’s unconcealment] > man seeks the boundary’s mystery (Geheimnis der Grenze), can’t be hidden (bergen) anywhere but in the voice (Stimme), die sein Wesen be-stimmt (tunes/determines) [phonocentrism]

HDG.LP.content: poet’s statement remains unspoken, from its site rise waves, moving the Saying, each wave causes movement of Saying to flow back into ever more hidden source (verhüllteren Ursprung) > from metaphysical-aesthetic point of view: the site/source of wave holds (birgt) w/in hidden nature of what first appears as rhythm
HDG.LP.linkedContent: poet’s statement remains unspoken, from its site rise waves, moving the Saying, each wave causes movement of Saying to flow back into ever more hidden source (verhüllteren Ursprung) > from metaphysical-aesthetic point of view: the site/source of wave holds (birgt) w/in hidden nature of what first appears as rhythm

HDG.LP.content: in Einfalt of childhood is hidden (verbirgt) the geschwisterliche Zwiefalt des Menschengeschlechtes [the brotherly/sisterly twofoldness of mankind] > in apartness, evil neither destroyed/denied nor set free/affirmed: evil is transformed (to endure this transformation, soul must be great)
HDG.LP.linkedContent: in Einfalt of childhood is hidden (verbirgt) the geschwisterliche Zwiefalt des Menschengeschlechtes [the brotherly/sisterly twofoldness of mankind] > in apartness, evil neither destroyed/denied nor set free/affirmed: evil is transformed (to endure this transformation, soul must be great)

HDG.LP.content: Trakl silently sounds the mystery (Geheimnis) > the unity (Einheit) of “One Generation (Ein Geschlecht),” arises (entquillt) from the race (Schlag) that gathers along path of stranger, enfolds discord of generations into gentler two-fold > One of One Generation, not opposed to two but hidden unifying force [indifference point?] > Geschlecht names historical generation of man, mankind as distinct (Unterschied) from all other living creatures, names race, tribes, clans, families, & always refers to twofoldness of sexes
HDG.LP.linkedContent: Trakl silently sounds the mystery (Geheimnis) > the unity (Einheit) of “One Generation (Ein Geschlecht),” arises (entquillt) from the race (Schlag) that gathers along path of stranger, enfolds discord of generations into gentler two-fold > One of One Generation, not opposed to two but hidden unifying force [indifference point?] > Geschlecht names historical generation of man, mankind as distinct (Unterschied) from all other living creatures, names race, tribes, clans, families, & always refers to twofoldness of sexes

HDG.OHF.content: [Dilthey continues Schleiermacher’s reduction] the developments of hermeneutics (Patristic period and Luther) hidden from Dilthey > still, watering-down of Dilthey today can’t come close to his position re: hermeneutics
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [Dilthey continues Schleiermacher’s reduction] the developments of hermeneutics (Patristic period and Luther) hidden from Dilthey > still, watering-down of Dilthey today can’t come close to his position re: hermeneutics

HDG.OHF.content: expressive network of reference to different cultural systems demands possibility of holding onto them in a unified manner (einer einheitlichen Behaltbarkeit) > thus, investigations are actualizing (vollzieht) themselves out of a foresight re: and of a having-in-view of styles (Vorsicht auf- und einem Im-Blick-haben des Stils) > w/in this point of view (Hinblick) the modes of expressive being are actualized > the anticipatory having-present of the cultural object, running in advance of all research, made explicit in its actualization: das Vorweghaben der Stileinheitlichkeit (the anticipatory forehaving or path-having in advance of unity of style) proves/guards (bewährt) its adequacy to subject matter while explaining itself (its basic characteristics still hidden) [self-fulfilling w/out an eye to destruction]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: expressive network of reference to different cultural systems demands possibility of holding onto them in a unified manner (einer einheitlichen Behaltbarkeit) > thus, investigations are actualizing (vollzieht) themselves out of a foresight re: and of a having-in-view of styles (Vorsicht auf- und einem Im-Blick-haben des Stils) > w/in this point of view (Hinblick) the modes of expressive being are actualized > the anticipatory having-present of the cultural object, running in advance of all research, made explicit in its actualization: das Vorweghaben der Stileinheitlichkeit (the anticipatory forehaving or path-having in advance of unity of style) proves/guards (bewährt) its adequacy to subject matter while explaining itself (its basic characteristics still hidden) [self-fulfilling w/out an eye to destruction]
